metadata.title: CVE-2024-57184 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC v0.8.0, as demonstrated by MP4Box. Itcontains a heap-based buffer overflow in gf_m2ts_process_pmt inmedia_tools/mpegts.c:2163 that can cause a denial of service (DOS) via acrafted MP4 file.

criterions.comment: gpac package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
